options.description:
Flag which specifies the pixel to refer to. Default is 255 i.e. all eight pixels are used.

Flags to local 3x3 coordinates maps like this:

1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8
options.name: coordinates

options.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
options.name: threshold0

options.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
options.name: threshold1

options.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.

options.name: threshold3
